# ReplaceTextOptions.EndStrategy property

Gets or sets a value that represents the strategy to follow for the endpoint of the text element to be inserted. The default value is Default.

```csharp
public EndLocationStrategy EndStrategy { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

One of the enumeration values [`EndLocationStrategy`](../EndLocationStrategy.md).
